title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 272.4 - Right of inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 272.4 - Right of inspection

State Regulations

Each licensee shall permit authorized representatives of
the Commissioner of General Services to have full, free and untrammeled access
to all vessels, yards, buildings, structures and erections of every name, nature, character and description used in connection with the operations
carried on under said license, and shall accord full, free and untrammeled
inspection and examination of all records and books of account kept in
connection with said operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
272.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
